response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an invaluable asset to you. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product to your esteemed organization. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
